subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s team will open its 2009 domestic schedule on May 20 with a match against Japan in Frisco, Tex. The United States Soccer Federation said the Americans would also play Japan on May 23 in Sandy, Utah, to finish the two-game series. The federation said the Texas game would be the first meeting between the countries since the 2008 Olympic semifinal, which the United States won, 4-2, in Beijing. team usa.
